text: Al-Hafez (The Protector) is a Salafi channel from the Sinai Peninsula that promotes the Quran. The channel also promotes Islamist parties such as the Muslim Brotherhood since the 2011 Egyptian revolution. The channel had a lawsuit filed against them due to the channel calling for the assassination of political candidates. == References== Category:Arabic-language television stations Category:Television stations in Egypt
title: Al-Hafez
